attributes.action: stop mosques being built in the uk and punishing british people for living in thier own country
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: people of the uk are tolerant to all faiths but enough is enough, our own traditions are being forgotten. we must abide by other countries laws and rules, so why should other cultures be any different. we need to start returning our traditions and remembering why the great is placed in great britain. enough is enough.

rejection.details:
There are already petitions on this topic:
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/search?q=mosque
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
